item.title: PowerBI Expert Needed for Data Visualization - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a PowerBI expert to create a visually appealing and insightful dashboard for our customer data. We have an Excel file with exports of customer information, budget, and margin. The goal is to use PowerBI to analyze and present the data in a way that provides useful insights and improves readability. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of PowerBI and data visualization techniques. They should be able to transform raw data into meaningful charts, graphs, and tables. Attention to detail and the ability to identify trends and patterns in the data is essential.

Skills required:
- PowerBI
- Data visualization
- Excel

This is a small project that can be completed in 3 or 4 hours.  We are looking for an expert with a high level of expertise in PowerBI and data analysis.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 07, 2024 09:03 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Tableau
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Tableau
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: SQL-Azure-Power BI specialist for long-term co-operation - Upwork
item.description:
We have been working with 3 Power BI  consultants through Upwork for many years now and now we are looking to add a 4th developer to the team to take on the data engineering and data modeling challenges.

The job requires 12-16 hours per week.

Working on a global scale enterprise Power BI tenant we are looking for an advanced data engineer with sufficient all round technical knowledge and experience with Power BI.

You will be asked to further develop, troubleshoot and optimize Power BI dashboards ranging from:

- Operational data (Logistics Warehouse Management)
- Freight flows (geo coded, centre of gravity)
- Financial data
- CRM (MS Dynamics)

Our data sources range from Azure Sequel, to on prem and python-based API's.

We are looking for someone with strong analytical, problem solving skills. You need to be available during European business hours so full time Freelancers only.

Hourly Range: $45.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 07, 2024 08:05 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.description:
We are looking for expert to connect Microsoft Power BI to our Shopify stores: we would like to track our sales on specific products, SKUs more specifically, how many of each SKU has been sold in specific period and since we have currently 3 live stores (slovenian, croatian and italy) + in the progress of adding 2 more: austrian and germany, we would like to track the trend of sales. This would help us with future stock order planning

Currently we have one store per country so Shopify stores are separated - not all in one.

item.title: Allocation of Power BI Embedded resources to Power BI workspace - Upwork
item.description:
**Project Overview:**
We are seeking an experienced Power BI developer to assist with the allocation of Power BI Embedded resources to Power BI workspace. Our organization currently uses both Power BI Embedded and Power BI Premium Per User (PPU) for visualizing internal data, and we need to ensure that our Embedded capacity is optimally utilized within our workspace.

**Responsibilities:**
- Assess our current Power BI Embedded and PPU setup.
- Allocate Power BI Embedded resources to the designated Power BI workspace.
- Optimize the workspace to ensure efficient use of Embedded capacity.
- Provide guidance and best practices for managing Power BI capacities.
- Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to resource allocation.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience with Power BI Embedded and Power BI Premium Per User.
- Strong understanding of Power BI capacities and their allocation.
- Ability to optimize Power BI workspaces for performance and cost-efficiency.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Good communication skills and the ability to provide clear documentation.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Previous experience working on similar projects.
- Knowledge of Power BI administration and governance.
- Familiarity with Azure services related to Power BI.

**Project Timeline:**
The project is expected to be completed within 1 day.

Interested candidates should submit their offer including An estimated timeline for completing the job.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 07, 2024 07:29 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Modeling, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Modeling, Business Intelligence
Country: Saudi Arabia
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Dashboard Creation Assistance - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Power BI expert to assist us in creating visually appealing and insightful dashboards. As our organization relies heavily on data-driven decision making, it is crucial that the dashboards are designed to provide clear and concise information. The successful candidate will have a strong background in Power BI and a proven track record in creating interactive and user-friendly dashboards. Responsibilities include gathering requirements, designing data models, developing visualizations, and ensuring the dashboards are dynamic and easy to navigate.

  Skills required:
  - Proficient in Power BI
  - Strong data modeling skills
  - Expertise in creating interactive dashboards
  - Knowledge of data visualization best practices
  - Ability to gather and understand business requirements

  This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Power BI specialist who can quickly understand our business needs and translate them into effective dashboards. If you are passionate about data visualization and have a keen eye for design, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 07, 2024 06:22 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Operations and Process Management - Upwork
item.description:
SUMMARY
Meridian University is seeking an individual experienced with managing operations across multiple domains & functions.  This role involves both process management and project management as well as quality assurance across domains.

ONBOARDING & TIME COMMITMENTS
Training into this role would occur over the span of multiple months and would include an exploration of many functions across domains.  During training, either a part-time schedule or a full-time schedule can be accommodated.  Following training, this role would require 40 hours per week, ongoing.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Coordinating and coaching remote teams for operational excellence
- Building, optimizing, and running complex multistep processes
- Leading initiatives related to knowledge management, automation, and efficiency
- Supporting team members with activities such as case management, program scheduling, liaising, and research

REQUIRED SKILLS & TENDENCIES
- Experience guiding and motivating teams
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Interest in taking a hands-on approach to projects
- Self-management skills, notably by way of time-management, initiative, and diligence

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
- Experience working in a higher education setting or experience as a graduate-level student
- Proficiency in finance, compliance, or data analytics
- Familiarity with Salesforce (experience using other CRM and ERP systems also useful, e.g. Dynamics 365, SAP, HubSpot, etc.)
- Familiarity with Microsoft 365 (Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Excel, Power BI, etc.)

ABOUT MERIDIAN UNIVERSITY
Founded 30 years ago in the San Francisco Bay Area, Meridian University enrolls students globally in its unique hybrid and 100% online graduate degree, certificate, and public programs. The University offers master's and doctoral programs in Psychology, Education and Business with diverse concentrations available within each of these programs. Meridian's integrated, innovative curriculum is designed to be experiential and transformative.
Meridian graduates are engaged in varied professional contexts that include coaching, psychotherapy, organizational development, facilitation, social healing, social entrepreneurship, and transformative leadership.


Posted On: June 07, 2024 03:03 UTC
Category: Digital Project Management
Skills:Team Management, Business Operations, Continuous Improvement, Change Management, Quality Assurance, Process Development, Process Improvement, Project Workflows, Administrative Support, Knowledge Management
Skills: Team Management, Business Operations, Continuous Improvement, Change Management, Quality Assurance, Process Development, Process Improvement, Project Workflows, Administrative Support, Knowledge Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Data Visualization Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Data Visualization Specialist to help us transform our Excel spreadsheets into visually appealing and informative data representations. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of data visualization techniques and tools, along with the ability to interpret and present complex data in a clear and concise manner. As a Data Visualization Specialist, you will work closely with our team to understand our data requirements and design visually appealing charts, graphs, and dashboards. This is a great opportunity for someone with a strong attention to detail and a passion for turning data into actionable insights.

Skills required:

- Proficiency in data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js
- Strong knowledge of Excel and data manipulation
- Understanding of data analysis and statistical concepts
- Excellent communication and presentation skills

If you are a creative and analytical thinker with a keen eye for design and a passion for data, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 07, 2024 01:52 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Tableau, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Dashboard, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Tableau, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI
Country: Australia

item.title: Power BI Dashboard Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Power BI Dashboard Developer to build interactive dashboards and set up automatic and self-service reports from various data sources and platforms. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of data visualization and experience in developing complex Power BI solutions. This role will involve working closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into effective dashboards that provide actionable insights.
Key responsibilities include:
- Designing, developing, and implementing Power BI dashboards and reports
- Integrating data from multiple sources and ensuring data accuracy and quality
- Creating visually appealing and user-friendly interactive dashboards
- Optimizing dashboards for performance and accessibility
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and deliver solutions
- Providing training and support to end-users as needed.
- Providing technical documentation for handover upon project completion.
If you have a passion for data analytics, excellent problem-solving skills, and expertise in Power BI, we would love to hear from you.

item.title: Azure Data Lake Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Good to Great Schools Australia is dedicated to leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and efficiency. We are currently seeking an experienced Azure Data Lake Specialist to design, implement, and maintain our data lake infrastructure, enabling our teams to make data-driven decisions through robust PowerBI dashboards.

Context:
-----
We currently use Learn Dash and WordPress to collect customer data, with limited other data repositories. Our goal is to create a centralized data lake that consolidates data from these sources and supports comprehensive data analysis and reporting through PowerBI.

Job Description:
-----
Responsibilities:
-----
Propose a Solution:
-----
- Assess the current data infrastructure, including data from Learn Dash and WordPress.
- Design a comprehensive Azure data lake solution that meets business needs, with estimated monthly costs.
- Present the proposed solution, including architecture diagrams, data flow processes, and security measures.

Implement the Solution:
-----
- Set up the Azure data lake environment, ensuring scalability and performance.
-Develop scripts to automate daily copies of the production database, including hashing of personally identifiable information (PII).
- Ensure seamless integration with PowerBI for data visualization and analysis.

Document the Solution:
-----
- Create detailed documentation on how to connect PowerBI to the Azure data lake.
- Provide example SQL queries and database connection guidelines.
- Develop user guides and best practices for internal teams.

Implement Security/Permissions:
-----
- Configure Azure security settings to ensure that only internal users with Microsoft Accounts can access the data lake.
- Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) and data masking techniques to protect sensitive information.
- Conduct security audits and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

Provide Time Estimate:
-----
- Estimate the number of hours required to deliver the proposed solution.
- Develop a project timeline with key milestones and deliverables.

Qualifications:
-----
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Proven experience in setting up and managing Azure data lake solutions.
- Strong proficiency in SQL and data manipulation.
- Hands-on experience with PowerBI, including dashboard creation and data integration.
In-depth knowledge of data security best practices, including hashing, encryption, and access controls.
- Excellent documentation and communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred Skills:
-----
- Familiarity with data governance and compliance standards (e.g. GDPR).
- Experience with data migration and ETL processes.
- Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) for automation.
- Experience with Learn Dash and WordPress data structures.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and cover letter. Azure certifications are highly regarded.

A selected candidate will be asked to provide a project proposal outlining their approach to setting up the Azure data lake, including estimated hours for delivery.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00

We are currently seeking an experienced Azure Data Lake Specialist to design, implement, and maintain our data lake infrastructure, enabling our teams to make data-driven decisions through robust PowerBI dashboards.

-----
We currently use Learn Dash and WordPress to collect customer data, with limited other data repositories. Our goal is to create a centralized data lake that consolidates data from these sources and supports comprehensive data analysis and reporting through PowerBI.

Job Description:
-----
Responsibilities:
-----
Propose a Solution:
-----
- Assess the current data infrastructure, including data from Learn Dash and WordPress.
- Design a comprehensive Azure data lake solution that meets business needs, with estimated monthly costs.
- Present the proposed solution, including architecture diagrams, data flow processes, and security measures.

Implement the Solution:
-----
- Set up the Azure data lake environment, ensuring scalability and performance.
-Develop scripts to automate daily copies of the production database, including hashing of personally identifiable information (PII).

Document the Solution:
-----
- Create detailed documentation on how to connect PowerBI to the Azure data lake.
- Provide example SQL queries and database connection guidelines.
- Develop user guides and best practices for internal teams.

Implement Security/Permissions:
-----
- Configure Azure security settings to ensure that only internal users with Microsoft Accounts can access the data lake.
- Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) and data masking techniques to protect sensitive information.
- Conduct security audits and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

Provide Time Estimate:
-----
- Estimate the number of hours required to deliver the proposed solution.
- Develop a project timeline with key milestones and deliverables.

Qualifications:
-----
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Proven experience in setting up and managing Azure data lake solutions.
- Strong proficiency in SQL and data manipulation.
- Hands-on experience with PowerBI, including dashboard creation and data integration.
In-depth knowledge of data security best practices, including hashing, encryption, and access controls.
- Excellent documentation and communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

-----

- Experience with data migration and ETL processes.
- Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) for automation.
- Experience with Learn Dash and WordPress data structures.

item.title: Company Dashboard Programmer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled programmer to develop a company dashboard for our fabrication company based out of India. The dashboard will serve as a centralized platform to track and analyze various aspects of our business operations. The ideal candidate should have experience in developing robust and user-friendly dashboards, with a strong understanding of data visualization and analytics. The programmer will be responsible for designing and implementing the dashboard, integrating data from multiple sources, and ensuring its seamless functionality.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++
- Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI
- Strong knowledge of database management systems and SQL
- Familiarity with web development frameworks, such as Django or Angular

This is a medium-sized project that is expected to be completed within 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level programmer with prior experience in developing similar dashboards for businesses.

If you are passionate about creating efficient and insightful dashboards that can drive data-informed decision-making, we would love to hear from you!

item.title: Data Science Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
About Our Company
Are you passionate about harnessing the power of data to drive innovation and growth? At Our Company, we are dedicated to transforming the digital presence of independent hotels, B&Bs, and short-term rental owners. Through our cutting-edge revenue management algorithm, we empower independent hotels across Europe to achieve unparalleled success.

In just under two years, Our Company has skyrocketed from a small student startup to the brink of scaling up, thanks to our commitment to innovation and excellence. Originally founded as an IT company, we are now evolving into a hybrid IT/people-centric business, where the human factor is as crucial as technology.

As we continue to expand, we are hiring a highly skilled and motivated Data Science Analyst to join our dynamic team for a 3 to 4-month project. This role offers the unique opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing company that values flexibility, innovation, and the personal growth of its employees. Our hybrid work model allows you to work from our vibrant offices in Ghent, Belgium or from home.

Responsibilities:
1. Economic and Statistical Analysis:
- Analyse economic data to identify trends and patterns.
- Utilise statistical techniques to interpret complex datasets.
2. Data Modelling:
- Develop predictive models and algorithms to support business decision-making.
- Create and refine data models to represent complex systems and processes.
3. Script Development:
- Write scripts to automate data extraction, cleaning, and analysis processes.
- Ensure scripts are well-documented and can be easily understood by developers.
4. Collaboration with Developers:
- Translate analytical requirements into technical specifications for developers.
- Work closely with development teams to integrate analytical models into production systems.
5. Reporting and Communication:
- Prepare detailed reports and visualisations to communicate findings to stakeholders.
- Present complex data insights clearly and concisely.
6. Continuous Improvement:
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in data science and economics.
- Identify opportunities for improving data processes and models.

Required Skills:
- A master’s in economics and statistics.
- Proficiency in data analysis and modelling techniques.
- Full proficiency in English and have excellent communication skills.
- Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, R).
- Ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Familiarity with data visualisation tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).

Nice to have:
• Experience with the Technology/ SaaS is a major plus!
• Experience with the hospitality sector is a big plus!
• Experience in prospecting strategic decision-makers and executives
• A proven track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets consistently


Hourly Range: $16.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 06, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Predictive Model, Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Skills: Predictive Model, Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.content:encoded:
We're a boutique marketing agency. We are looking for someone to help us visualize our clients' data and present it in a beautiful manner. It would be very helpful if you are familiar with integrations and automation software, as well. We also want someone who will proactively give us advice about how to work with the data we have available to us. You need to know what you're talking about!

We work heavily with HubSpot.

Independent freelancers only.

Responsibilities:
-Create dynamic visualizations using Looker, Databox, Power BI, and Klipfolio.
-Extract and transform data with BigQuery, SQL, and Python.
-Integrate data using Zapier, Make.com, Supermetrics, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
-Automate data workflows and cloud functions.
-Collaborate to understand data requirements and deliver visual solutions.
-Maintain data integrity and quality.
-Stay updated on data visualization trends.

Qualifications
-Experience in data visualization and marketing analytics.
-Proficiency in SQL, Python, and cloud platforms (GCP, BigQuery).
-Expertise in Looker Data Studio, Power BI, Klipfolio.
-Familiarity with Zapier, Make.com, Supermetrics.
-Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00

item.title: usiness Intelligence Specialist (Microsoft Power BI) - Part-time with Potential for Full-time - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a passionate data enthusiast who believes in the power of Business Intelligence? Do you want to work in a dynamic and innovative environment where your ideas are valued and you can make a real impact? If so, you are exactly who we are looking for!

We are a burgeoning Data and AI startup, seeking a highly skilled and motivated Business Intelligence Specialist with expertise in Microsoft Power BI. This position starts as part-time with the exciting opportunity to transition into a full-time role. You will not only work on internal BI solutions but also actively contribute to shaping our future and developing innovative solutions for our clients.

Your Mission:

-Develop and maintain Power BI reports and dashboards that revolutionize our internal processes.
-Be the go-to person for impressive demos of our BI solutions, making our vision tangible.
-Dive deep into complex data sets and generate actionable insights that drive our strategy forward.
-Ensure the accuracy and integrity of our data, keeping our BI solutions up-to-date and efficient.
-Optimize and enhance existing reports and dashboards to achieve maximum efficiency.
-Train and support our team members in utilizing Power BI, helping them to extract the best from our data.



What You Should Bring:

-Proven experience as a Business Intelligence Specialist or in a similar role.
-Extensive experience with Microsoft Power BI (preferably 3+ years).
-Strong understanding of data warehousing, data modeling, and ETL processes.
-Experience with SQL and database management.
-Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
-Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


What Makes Us Special:

-The opportunity to transition from part-time to full-time.
Flexible working hours and a remote work environment.
-Opportunities for professional growth and continuous learning.
-An exciting chance to work in an innovative Data and AI startup where your ideas truly matter.
-The opportunity to be part of a passionate and creative community that is transforming the world of data.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about what you do and meet the above qualifications, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, cover letter, and examples of your previous Power BI work through Upwork.

Category: Data Visualization
